label: CalibratedMeasurement
comment: A measurement established by a device which is tested to a calibration standard of known accuracy.

objectProperties.comment: The identifier for this calibrated measurement.
The code specifying a quantification type for this calibrated measurement, such as measured, calculated, or estimated.
The measure of the tolerance of this calibrated measurement.
The percent of tolerance of this calibrated measurement.
The code specifying a value for this calibrated measurement.
The value of a measure for this calibrated measurement.
The identifier of a version of this calibrated measurement.

referencedBy.comment: An actual calibrated measurement reported for this monitoring sensor.
A calibrated measurement of precision for this monitoring sensor.
A scheduled calibrated measurement reported for this monitoring sensor.
A calibrated measurement specified for this specified condition.
